      • greyToBufferedImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage greyToBufferedImage(short[][] inputGreyImageData)
        This method can convert array of short inputImageDatatype into a BufferedImage. After being converted into type of BufferedImage, the image can be showed on GUI.
        Parameters:
        inputGreyImageData - The short[][] of grey image data
        Returns:
        a object of BufferedImage which is coverted from the input grey image data array

      • performEqualization

        public void performEqualization()

      • equalizeImage

        public short[][] equalizeImage(short[][] inputGreyImageData,
                      double[] equalizedHistogram)
        Return the image data after histogram-equalization. This method applies the algorithm of histogram-equalization on the input image data.
        Parameters:
        inputGreyImageData - input grey image data need to be histogram-equalized
        equalizedHistogram - equalized histogram of inputGreyImageData
        Returns:
        the image data histogram-equalized
